Question: Shenzhen RainBow Electronic Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Rainbow Electronic Co., Ltd

Product: Screen Protectors, Phone Cases, Watch Straps

- Specializes in developing, manufacturing, and marketing screen protectors, phone cases, and watch straps
- 15,000 square meters production area, 30 engineers, 200 workers
- Daily capacity: 90K 2.5D flat tempered glass, 30K 3D curved glass, 80K phone cases, 100K watch straps
- Quality control system, ISO 9001;2008/BSCI/Wal-Mart Audit passed factory
- OEM/ODM services, CE and RoHS Standards compliant
- Strategic partnerships with overseas and domestic top brands
- Products sold in over 50 countries
- Annual revenue of US$60,000,000
